import React,{useEffect}from'react';import'./menu4.css';import{Link}from"react-router-dom";// Tämä komponentti näyttää navigointivalikon
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Menu4=()=>{useEffect(()=>{const handleScroll=()=>{const menu3=document.querySelector('.menu3');const placeholder=document.querySelector('.menu3.placeholder');if(window.scrollY>50){menu3.classList.add('fixed');placeholder.style.display='block';}else{menu3.classList.remove('fixed');placeholder.style.display='none';}};window.addEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);return()=>{window.removeEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);};},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"menu3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Etusivu"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/Build",children:"Suunnittele Yarbosi"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/Contact",children:"Yhteystiedot"})})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"menu3 placeholder"})]});};export default Menu4;
